meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds derived from xylene.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying different xylidins to understand their properties better.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician identified various xylidins under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The xylidins in the experiment decided to throw a party to celebrate their unique structures.
meanings.sent4: The diversity of xylidins in nature is like a colorful bouquet of organic molecules.
meanings.sent5: When you look at xylidins through a scientific lens, they reveal fascinating chemical structures.

meanings.sent1: The researchers found many xylidins in their samples, indicating a successful experiment.
meanings.sent2: Xylidins are commonly used in the production of certain dyes.
meanings.sent3: At the chemistry conference, the xylidins stood out as a group of compounds with a shared destiny.
meanings.sent4: The field of chemistry is like a garden where xylidins bloom in abundance.
meanings.sent5: In the world of organic chemistry, xylidins play a crucial role in various reactions.
